scripts.build: vite build && cp dist/index.html dist/404.html && touch dist/.nojekyll && mkdir -p dist/feedback dist/apps/earth-space dist/apps/biology dist/apps/global-history dist/apps/us-history dist/apps/algebra-1 dist/apps/earth-space/feedback dist/apps/biology/feedback dist/apps/global-history/feedback dist/apps/us-history/feedback dist/apps/algebra-1/feedback dist/app/earth-space dist/app/biology dist/app/global-history dist/app/us-history dist/app/algebra-1 dist/app/earth-space/feedback dist/app/biology/feedback dist/app/global-history/feedback dist/app/us-history/feedback dist/app/algebra-1/feedback && for p in feedback apps/earth-space apps/biology apps/global-history apps/us-history apps/algebra-1 apps/earth-space/feedback apps/biology/feedback apps/global-history/feedback apps/us-history/feedback apps/algebra-1/feedback app/earth-space app/biology app/global-history app/us-history app/algebra-1 app/earth-space/feedback app/biology/feedback app/global-history/feedback app/us-history/feedback app/algebra-1/feedback; do cp dist/index.html dist/$p/index.html; done
